name: 顏炳郎
objective: 本課程內容包括頻域的Z-轉換、取樣資料系統、數位濾波器設計、數位控制器設計、及狀態空間之數位控制器設計、電腦控制等。
schedule:
•　　Topic 1: Introduction: Why Digital Control 
•　　Topic 2: A typical Mechatronic System
•　　Topic 3: Classical Controller Review (non-model based), Lab
•　　Topic 4: Classical Controller Review (model based), Lab
•　　Topic 5: Digital Control System Basis
•　　Topic 6: Approximation of Continuous Controller, Lab
•　　Topic 7: Digital Controller Design (model based), Lab
scorePolicy:
Homework and Quiz 70%
　　　　Midterm exam 15%
　　　　Final Experiment (Digital controller implementation) 15%
materials:
1.　　Åström, K.J and Wittenmark, B.: Computer Controlled Systems, 3rd ed. Prentice Hall, 1997.

Reference Books:
2.　　Franklin, G.F. and Powell, J.D.: Digital Control of Dynamic Systems, 3rd ed., Addison-Wesley Longman Inc., 1998.
3.　　Franklin, G.F., Powell, J.D. and Emami-Naeiini, A.: Feedback Control of Dynamic Systems, 3rd ed. Addison-Wesley Publishing Co., 1994.
